scripts.postinstall: bash ./scripts/generateCertificates.sh; if [ $CLIENT_ENV ]; then npm run postinstall-client; elif [ $SERVER_ENV ]; then npm run postinstall-server; else echo no environment detected, please set CLIENT_ENV or SERVER_ENV; fi
scripts.postinstall-client: cd frontend && npm install --force && npm run build
scripts.postinstall-server: cd backend && npm install -g @nestjs/cli && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: if [ $CLIENT_ENV ]; then npm run start:client; elif [ $SERVER_ENV ]; then npm run start:server; else echo no environment detected, please set CLIENT_ENV or SERVER_ENV; fi
